name: Once upon a sign
description:
CONTROLS :   Left , up  and right arrows to transform the sign in order to chose a path for the hikers ! 

/!\ FULLSCREEN : please use the Itch button and not the Unity one (which is blue and crash the game...)

Game realized for the Pot-au-jeu Game Jam organized by At0mium. Enjoy and leave a comment !

Once upon a time, in a mysterious and haunted forest, brave knights, innocent little children and even intrepid youtubers were wandering. How unfortunate that this particular forest was also the lair of a bunch of famished monsters... It would be a real shame if a bewitched and malicious Sign transform itself to trick and mislead the hikers ! ! Guide the hikers to the three different paths to feed the monsters, and be careful to not let the monsters starve nor stuff them ! Beware, every type hiker has its own nutritional intake and more or less fill the hunger-gauges !

We used free assets for the font and the SFX:

Kenney
- Menu select sound
SuperPowers asset pack
- Creature sounds
Speedenza
- Whoosh sound on sign metamorphosis
Godowan
- Exclamation point appear sound
Geronimo Font Studios
- Kindergarten font for in game text and menu
Iconian Fonts
- Young frankentein font used for menu assets
